memories.title: The Day We Met
memories.description: It was a crisp December afternoon when our eyes first met across the college courtyard. I remember thinking how your smile could light up the entire campus...

memories.title: First Coffee Together
memories.description: Our first unofficial date at the campus coffee shop. We talked for 4 hours straight about everything and nothing. I knew then that I wanted to know everything about you...

memories.title: The Flour Fight
memories.description: What started as an attempt to bake cookies turned into the Great Flour War of 2024. We ended up with more flour on us than in the bowl, but our laughter echoed through the kitchen for hours...

memories.title: Midnight Stargazing
memories.description: Lying on a blanket under the stars, your head on my shoulder, talking about our dreams and future. You pointed out constellations while I got lost in the constellation of freckles on your cheek...

memories.title: Rainy Day Couch Fort
memories.description: When the power went out during the storm, we built the most elaborate couch fort and spent the day telling stories by candlelight. Sometimes the best adventures happen at home...

categories.name: Milestones
categories.description: Important moments that shaped our journey

categories.name: Funny Moments
categories.description: Times that made us laugh until our stomachs hurt

categories.name: Romantic
categories.description: Moments that took our breath away
